<title level="1" right="Rules">[Expanding a Kingdom](/Rules.aspx?ID=1786)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 534</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A kingdom grows one hex at a time on the Stolen Lands map, via Region activities like [Claim Hex](/Actions.aspx?ID=1373) and [Clear Hex](/Actions.aspx?ID=1374). The PCs can pursue these activities during the [Activity phase](/Rules.aspx?ID=1805) of each Kingdom turn.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
